title: Title
name: Name
searchByAuthor: Search by author name or email
author: Author
activePageVisible: An active page is visible to users
blocksHelper: Blocks are list of data. Each block are mainly displayed as a left (image) and right (title and description) column of the page.
pageNameHelper: The page is displayed by its name (in a link for example), also the slug is generated by page name by default
pageTitleHelper: The page title is displayed above in the page
pagesHelper: Other pages data to display to the current page
seoDescription: SEO (Search Engine Optimization) is the process of affecting the visibility of a website or a web page in a search engine's unpaid results (ex: Google, Bing, ...)

category.activeCategoryVisible: An active category is visible to users
category.categoryForHelper: Category for which entity is this for (ex: category of an article, ...)

errors.pageToUpdateNotFound: The page you are attempting to update does not exists, it may have been deleted.
errors.pageToDeleteNotFound: The page you are attempting to delete does not exists, it may have been deleted.
errors.hasNoRightToDelete: You can not delete this page
errors.hasNoRightToUpdate: You can not update this page
errors.hasNoRightToCreate: You can not create a page
errors.categoryToUpdateNotFound: The category you are attempting to update does not exists, it may have been deleted.
errors.categoryToDeleteNotFound: The category you are attempting to delete does not exists, it may have been deleted.
errors.hasNoRightToDeleteCategory: You can not delete this category
errors.hasNoRightToUpdateCategory: You can not update this category
errors.hasNoRightToCreateCategory: You can not create a category
errors.mustProvideSecureUrl: You must provide a secure url
